Introduction


Ando Rinka (Korean: 안도 린카; Japanese: 安藤 梨花) is a Japanese singer and model under Avex Artist Academy. She is a member of the girl group Veil and was a former member of CoCoPoP. She is best known for being a contestant on the South Korean reality survival show, Girls Planet 999.
